item.title: Version 1.8.0
item.description:
What's New in v1.8.0

  • Header UX Improvements - More compact header with reduced whitespace
  • View Toggle in Header - Switch between list/grid directly from header
  • External Status Integration - Service status now in header
  • Compact Entity Cards - Smaller footer text for cleaner look
  • Performance Improvements - Faster UI rendering
